module.name: Weather by ZIP
module.description: Provide U.S. Weather by Zip Code
module.changelog: *1.3.6* Version bump for FreePBX 12 and fix short tags issue *1.3.4* Minor overhaul of dialplan generation *1.3.0* Added googletts and google weather support and minor bugs *1.2.1* Updated screen scrape for weather service site *1.2.0* Fixed for Asterisk 2.8+ and FreePBX 2.9/2.10+ *1.1.7* Issue #314, #316 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/versions/show/77) 9/23/10 *1.1.6* Issue #316 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/versions/show/65) 12-29-09 *1.1.5* Issue #148, #156 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/issues/show/118) 7-6-09 *1.1.4* Issue #118 (http://projects.colsolgrp.net/issues/show/118) 6-20-09 *1.1.3* Corrected cron task error in FreePBX(tshif) 5-18-09 *1.1.2* Re-Corrected swift playback of weather report. Corrected cron task insert error on upgrade.(tshif) 5-8-09 *1.1.1* Added cron task to delete tts files older than system date +1 (tshif) 5-4-09 *1.1.0* Corrected swift playback of weather report. Igor can be fully banished now (tshif) 4-9-09 *1.0.2* Debug variable correction. Removed dependance on default DB id/pw. (tshif) 4-8-09 *1.0.1* Minor clean up (tshif) 3-31-09 *1.0.0* 1st Module trial (tshif) 3-31-09
